QuestData.Title: Jarl Needs a Blade
QuestData.Description: I have cutting to do. I can't tell you what I'm going to cut, but... I need myself a blade. A certain blade...$B$BSome people call it a sword. I call it a swing blade.$B$BYou help me? Those fish-men, you know, murlocs or whatever they're called.... There's one they call Razorspine, carries a big sword, lives north of here near the beach. That's the sword I need!$B$BBut don't sleep on this. What I'm cutting won't keep forever...
QuestData.RewardText: That's a good blade. It has a good swing. It's a good swing blade. Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! Now I want to try it.... $B$BLater. I'll try it later. But like I was saying... thanks.
